name: Word Candies: Candyland Mania
description:
Sweet sugary candy? Challenging word puzzles? What’s not to like in this perfect game for you.

You’ve got a mix-bag of the tastiest candies around; all you have to do is SWIPE, MAKE WORDS and EARN COINS. So lay back, relax, and swipe away, form words and unlock new levels in this fun and mind-bending puzzle word game.

- Find hidden words in the list of provided letters
- Swipe through them to unlock those words and unlock new levels
- Progress through all the delicious different kinds of candy, in loads of unique levels.
- Get extra coins when you find extra words not listed!
- Challenge your friends to see who has reached the highest level in WORD CANDIES.

Improve your vocabulary as you solve delicious puzzles and find all the words and then some in this sweet casual game that’s addictive fun for all!

Mouth-watering visuals, satisfying gameplay, and challenging words to find in WORD CANDIES.

FUN and ENJOYABLE gameplay
Relaxing challenges with no time limits
Tickle your brain and expand your vocabulary
Play offline as well as online
